title: Example: Value Iteration
formulas: V_k+1(s) < max Σ T(s, a, s') [ R(s, a, s') + γ V_k(s') ]
summary: The slide presents an example of Value Iteration in AI, showing the process of updating state values V0, V1, and V2. It includes a diagram with cars in different states and actions, and formulas to calculate the next state value V_k+1(s) based on the maximum expected return.
